import React from 'react' import { urlIconCreator } from '../services/services' import { UilArrowUp, UilArrowDown } from "@iconscout/react-unicons" const Forcast = ({weather: {title, list, icon, tempFormat}}) => { return (

title

{list.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{`${item.temp}`}°{`${tempFormat}`}

{`${item.min_temp.toFixed()}`}°

|

{`${item.max_temp.toFixed()}`}°
))}
) } export default Forcast
